Description of the situation [Max 500 characters] 3. Photo/Video proof of the scam [2 to 10 media files] â€¼ï¸ Submitting a complaint that does not follow the form or contains potential spam to harm or delay the complaint system will result in a ban from submitting complaints, blocking in the bot, or adding to the suspicious users database. ğŸ”¸ By clicking "Fill Form", you automatically agree to the rules above.
